item.title: Roasted vegetables. A retrospective
item.description: Roasting Vegetables is great! its a great way to get rid of those lingering vegetables and its simple and quick to do! I see it as a fridge cleaner and an easy way to make a simple side. (but i end up eating them on its own!) Prerequisites There are no hard and fast rules when it comes to this. But i like to add in At least one onion like vegetables.
